wikipedia_page.main:
Mary Jones (July 19, 1896 - March 26, 1990) was a Welsh film actress. 
Jones was born in Rhayader, Radnorshire. She appeared in films like  Hay Fever (1946),  Celestial Fire (1948), The Big Chance (1957), The Promise (1969) and Under Milk Wood (1972).
